layouts_boxes.layouts_boxes_content: db ->where('entity_type', ENTITY_TYPE_SUPPORT_TABLE) ->join('entity', 'entity_id = grids_entity_id', 'LEFT') ->order_by('entity_name') ->limit(1000) ->get('grids') ->result_array(); $grids = []; */ ?>

grids.grids_custom_query:
SELECT *, grids_id AS support_table_manager_tables_id FROM grids 
LEFT JOIN entity ON entity_id = grids_entity_id
LEFT JOIN support_table_manager_tables ON entity_name = support_table_manager_tables_entity_name
LEFT JOIN users_type ON users_type_id = support_table_manager_tables_permission_group
WHERE entity_type = 2 AND users_type_value = 'Admin' ORDER BY grids_name ASC

grids.grids_custom_query:
SELECT *, grids_id AS support_table_manager_tables_id FROM grids 
LEFT JOIN entity ON entity_id = grids_entity_id
LEFT JOIN support_table_manager_tables ON entity_name = support_table_manager_tables_entity_name
LEFT JOIN users_type ON users_type_id = support_table_manager_tables_permission_group
WHERE entity_type = 2 ORDER BY grids_name ASC
